info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:47PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Luna County through 515 PM MDT... At 447 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Columbus, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
